    This Website

    less than 1 minute read

    Published: June 24, 2020

    Just refurnished this new website. It was powered by Jekyll & AcademicPages. The domain yunyishen.ml was registered from dot.tk for free (as long as you renew every year).

    gallery

    preprints

    Bayesian Conditional Auto-Regressive LASSO Models to Learn Sparse Networks with Predictors

    Published: December 20, 2020

    Conditional Auto-Regressive LASSO

    Recommended citation: Shen, Yunyi, and Solis-Lemus, Claudia. "Bayesian Conditional Auto-Regressive LASSO Models to Learn Sparse Networks with Predictors." arXiv (2020), under review of Annals of Applied Statistics. https://arxiv.org/abs/2012.08397

    The Effect of the Prior and the Experimental Design on the Inference of the Precision Matrix in Gaussian Chain Graph Models

    Published: June 30, 2021

    Conditional Auto-Regression experimental design

    Recommended citation: Shen, Yunyi, and Solis-Lemus, Claudia*. "The Effect of the Prior and the Experimental Design on the Inference of the Precision Matrix in Gaussian Chain Graph Models." arXiv (2021). https://arxiv.org/abs/2107.01306

    Identifying the distribution range and conservation needs of a large threatened mammal through an integrative mapping approach: the case of the Asiatic black bear, China

    Published: July 01, 2021

    Asiatic Black Bear

    Recommended citation: Shen, Yunyi, Liu, Mingzhang, Shen, Xiaoli* and Li, Sheng*. "Identifying the distribution range and conservation needs of a large threatened mammal through an integrative mapping approach: the case of the Asiatic black bear, China." under revision for Global Ecology and Conservation.

    CARlasso: An R package for the estimation of sparse microbial networks with predictors

    Published: August 10, 2021

    Conditional Auto-Regressive LASSO

    Recommended citation: Shen, Yunyi, and Solis-Lemus, Claudia*. "CARlasso: An R package for the estimation of sparse microbial networks with predictors." arXiv (2020), under review of Bioinformatics. https://arxiv.org/abs/2107.13763

    publications

    Evaluating the effectiveness of functional zones for black muntjac (Muntiacus crinifrons) protection in qianjiangyuan national park pilot site

    Published in Biodiversity Science, 27(1)., 2019

    Black Muntjc distribution in QJY nation park

    Recommended citation: Yu, J., Shen, Y., Song, X., Chen, X., Li, S.*, & Shen, X*. (2019). Evaluating the effectiveness of functional zones for black muntjac (Muntiacus crinifrons) protection in qianjiangyuan national park pilot site. Biodiversity Science, 27(1). https://doi.org/10.17520/biods.2018246

    Spatially Explicit Modeling of Community Occupancy using Markov Random Field Models with Imperfect Observation: Mesocarnivores in Apostle Islands National Lakeshore.

    Published in Ecological Modelling (accepted), 2021

    Markov Random Field based occupancy model

    Recommended citation: Shen, Yunyi*, Olson, Erik, and Van Deelen, Timothy. R. (2021). Spatially Explicit Modeling of Community Occupancy using Markov Random Field Models with Imperfect Observation: Mesocarnivores in Apostle Islands National Lakeshore. Ecological Modelling (accpeted). https://www.biorxiv.org/content/10.1101/2020.08.05.238774v4
